ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name , 'Sales Ops')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__Type__c , 'Renewal') ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.License_Term__c ) )), TEXT(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Custom_License_Term__c) <> TEXT(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.License_Term__c ), TEXT(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__Type__c ) != "Amendment", NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Custom_License_Term__c )), NOT( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.ClonedQuoteAppendName__c ), $User.Id <> "0054p000002sSsE" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If entered in Custom License Term in Primary Quote, please set the standard License Term picklist to none in Primary Quote.
